bref_version.description: The Bref PHP runtime version to work with. Can be specified with the `BREF_VERSION` environment variable.

region.description: AWS Region of Bref PHP runtime layers. Can be specified with the `AWS_REGION` or `AWS_DEFAULT_REGION` environment variable.

arn.description: The Bref PHP runtime lambda layer ARN.

layer_arn.description: The Bref PHP runtime lambda layer ARN.

layer_name.description: The Bref PHP runtime lambda layer name.

version.description: The Bref PHP runtime lambda layer version.

block.description: Bref PHP Lambda layer for published runtime version.
